backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor defining no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping implemented features to involved files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer with OKLCH theme variables, light/dark modes, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling all landing page sections with header and mobile CTA bar.
frontend/src/components/CtaButton.tsx: Reusable orange affiliate CTA button with size variants.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright, attribution link, and product disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/MobileStickyCtaB: Mobile-only sticky bottom bar containing a full‑width CTA button.
frontend/src/components/sections/Benefit: Benefits grid with icons, lifestyle image, and CTA button.
frontend/src/components/sections/FaqSect: Renders a FAQ accordion with toggleable questions and answers for GutOptim.
frontend/src/components/sections/FinalCt: Displays a final call‑to‑action section with headline, urgency note, CTA button, and product image.
frontend/src/components/sections/Formula: Shows GutOptim’s ingredient highlights with icons and descriptions plus an accompanying image.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Provides the main hero banner with product pitch, benefit bullets, CTA button, and product image.
frontend/src/components/sections/Problem: Explains common digestive issues and positions GutOptim as the solution with supporting visuals and CTA.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Displays customer reviews with star ratings, supporting images, and a CTA button.
frontend/src/components/sections/TrustQu: Lists trust and quality badges with icons and supporting image to reinforce product credibility.
frontend/src/components/StickyHeader.tsx: Sticky header with logo, smooth‑scroll navigation, mobile menu, and CTA button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user’s Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes, and component/utility classes for layout and styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, typography and animation extensions, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, architectural notes, and feature definitions for the GutOptim landing page.
